title: Carriers Deployed, Missiles Ready: How Close Is The US-Iran Conflict?
summary_full: Two American carrier strike groups are now positioned within operational reach of Iran. One, the USS Abraham Lincoln, has been tracked roughly 700 kilometres from the Iranian coastline.
summary_public: Two American carrier strike groups are now positioned within operational reach of Iran. One, the USS Abraham Lincoln, has been tracked roughly 700 kilometres from the Iranian coastline.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Carriers Deployed, Missiles Ready: How Close Is The US-Iran Conflict?
